Browserless is a headless browser automa: 无浏览器是一个无头的浏览器自动化工具，让您可以扫描网站、截图等更多。
Your Browserless API token (found in you: 您的浏览器API令牌 (在您的仪表板中找到)
Choose the regional endpoint closest to: 选择最接近您的区域端点以获得最佳性能。
Enter your custom Browserless endpoint U: 输入您自定义的无浏览器端点URL
\n To obtain your API credentials:\n\:
To obtain your API credentials:

    1. Sign up for a free Browserless account at https://www.browserless.io
    2. Navigate to your dashboard
    3. Find your API Key/Token in the account settings
    4. Choose your preferred regional endpoint for optimal performance

    Regional Endpoints:
    • US West (SFO): https://production-sfo.browserless.io
    • Europe UK (London): https://production-lon.browserless.io
    • Europe (Amsterdam): https://production-ams.browserless.io

    For custom/dedicated instances, select "Custom" and enter your specific endpoint URL.
Execute Browser Query Language (BQL) Gra: 执行高级浏览器自动化浏览器查询语言 (BQL) 图形QL查询
Analyze website performance metrics usin: 使用 Lightthouse 分析网站性能指标
Image quality (0-100, only for JPEG): 图像质量 (0-100, 仅用于 JPEG)
Width of the browser viewport in pixels: 浏览器视图的像素宽度
Height of the browser viewport in pixels: 浏览器视图的像素高度
CSS selector to wait for before taking s: CSS 选择器等待屏幕截图
Hide default white background for transp: 隐藏透明屏幕截图的默认白色背景
X coordinate of the top-left corner for: 左上角的 X 坐标
The URL of the page to convert to PDF: 要转换为 PDF 的页面的 URL
HTML content to render as PDF (alternati: 以 PDF 格式渲染的 HTML 内容(替代URL)
HTML template for the print header: 打印页眉的 HTML 模板
HTML template for the print footer: 打印页脚的 HTML 模板
CSS selector to wait for before generati: 生成PDF前要等待的 CSS 选择器
Timeout in milliseconds for waiting for: 等待选择器的超时时间（以毫秒为单位）
Give any CSS @page size declared in the: 给出页面优先于格式的 CSS @page 文件大小
Custom width of paper (e.g., \"8.5in\",: 自定义纸张宽度(例如，"8.5in", "210毫米")
Custom height of paper (e.g., \"11in\",: 自定义纸张高度 (例如"11in", "297毫米")
Hide default white background and allow: 隐藏默认白色背景并允许透明的 PDF
Generate tagged (accessible) PDF: 生成标记的 (可访问) PDF
Maximum time to wait for the page to loa: 等待页面加载的最大时间
JavaScript function to wait for before g: 生成 PDF 之前要等待的 JavaScript 函数。
Polling interval for wait function (\"ra: 等待函数的投票间隔("raf", "mutation", 或以毫秒为单位的数字)
Timeout in milliseconds for wait functio: 等待函数的超时时间（单位为毫秒）
Custom user agent string to use for the: 用于请求的自定义用户代理字符串
Timeout in milliseconds to wait before g: 在生成 PDF 之前以毫秒为单位等待超时
Attempt to proceed when awaited events f: 等待事件失败或超时时尝试继续
CSS selectors for elements to extract: 要提取元素的 CSS 选择器
CSS selector to wait for before scraping: CSS 选择器在拆解前等待
Timeout in milliseconds to wait before s: 拆解前等待超时（以毫秒为单位）
Event name to wait for before scraping: 拆解前要等待的事件名称
Timeout in milliseconds for wait event: 等待事件的超时时间（毫秒）
Include console logs in debug output: 在调试输出中包含控制台日志
Include cookies in debug output: 在调试输出中包含 cookie
Include network requests in debug output: 在调试输出中包含网络请求
Custom user agent string: 自定义用户代理字符串
JavaScript function to wait for before s: 在拆解前等待的 JavaScript 函数(准备好时应返回 true)
GraphQL-based BQL query for browser auto: GraphQL-based BQL query for browser automation. Example: mutation { goto(url: "https://example.com") { status } }
Variables to pass to the BQL query (JSON: 要传递到 BQL 查询的变量 (JSON 对象)
Name of the GraphQL operation to execute: 要执行的 GraphQL 操作名称
Enable stealth mode for bot detection by: 为机器人检测旁路启用隐身模式
Run browser in headless mode (set to fal: 在无头模式下运行浏览器 (设置为 false for GUI)
Enable human-like mouse movement, typing: 启用类似人为的鼠标移动，输入和延迟
住宅代理人的国家代码(例如, gb, de)
Maintain same proxy IP across session: 在整个会话中保持相同的代理 IP
Automatically block/dismiss cookie conse: 自动屏蔽/关闭 cookie 同意广告
Enable session recording for debugging: 启用会话录制以进行调试

Ignore HTTPS certificate errors during n: 导航时忽略 HTTPS 证书错误
Cookies to set before executing BQL quer: 执行 BQL 查询前要设置的 Cookie
Select which performance categories to a: 选择要分析的性能类别(性能, 可访问性, 最佳做法, seo, pwa)
Device type for performance analysis: 用于性能分析的设备类型
Return only category scores without deta: 返回没有详细审计结果的类别分数
Maximum time to wait for the analysis to: 等待分析完成的最大时间
CSS selector to wait for before running: CSS 选择器等待运行性能分析
Lighthouse performance budgets for resou: 按资源规模计算的轻度业绩预算
Enable ad blocker during performance ana: 在性能分析中启用广告拦截器
